channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.1.19
item.description:
About v10.1.19 Update

  • v10.1.19: Improved Preferences line height.
  • v10.1.19: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.18: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.17: Improved compatibility with Matlab.
  • v10.1.16: Fixed Microsoft Remote Desktop issue.
  • v10.1.15: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.14: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.13: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.12: Improved compatibility with JavaAppLauncher.
  • v10.1.12: You can also use __{ }__ as well as @begin, @end.
  • v10.1.11: Minor improvement.
  • v10.1.10: __HoldingKeyToKey__ and __KeyOverlaidModifier__ support Option::KEYTOKEY_BEFORE_KEYDOWN and Option::KEYTOKEY_AFTER_KEYUP.
  • v10.1.9: Fixed a minor issue.
  • v10.1.8: Fixed a minor issue.
  • v10.1.7: Fixed a minor issue.
  • v10.1.6: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.5: Updated prepared settings.
  • v10.1.4: Minor improvement.
  • v10.1.3: Improved command line interface.
  • v10.1.2: Added an option to disable AXNotifier. ("AXNotifier" tab in Preferences.)
  • v10.1.1: Improved compatibility with JavaAppLauncher.
Karabiner Web Site
